Text:
There goes my trust in The Piratebay out of the galley port hole.......and Mr Alan Watson is a TRUSTED member ...... BOLLOCKS to that matey!

My NOD32 just picked up 2 avi exploit trojans in this......I download loads of stuff...usually read and pick my way through carefully....I've never had NOD pick up a virus and I havent had any problems for years, honestly.....

And this from a TRUSTED member...fuck off! I know the pirate bay is not the piratebay it is meant to be but to what kind of soulless cunts has it been sold?

I used "Sandboxie" (protected/boxed piece of storage) when downloading this: Sandboxie didn't crash, and McAfee and Malwarebytes' Anti-Malware also didn't found a trojan or other malware. It's clean to me! :D

Maybe they cleaned this torrent! ;-) Thanks for this great upload, alanwatson! :D I've seen a lot of Tom & Jerry, but not these shows! :D
i only downloaded vol 1 and it seems ok scanned clean
